dcterms:creator: J. S. Garofolo
L. F. Lamel
W. M. Fisher
J. G. Fiscus
D. S. Pallett
dcterms:description: The TIMIT dataset is an acoustic-phonetic continuous speech corpus that contains broadband recordings of 630 speakers of eight major dialects of American English, each reading ten phonetically rich sentences.
dcterms:title: TIMIT

dcterms:description: A proprietary dataset that is much larger than TIMIT, containing 1000 hours of training speech data, 100 hours of validation speech data, and 10 hours of test speech data.
dcterms:title: Proprietary dataset

dcterms:creator: D. Povey
A. Ghoshal
G. Boulianne
L. Burget
O. Glembek
N. Goel
M. Hannemann
P. Motlicek
Y. Qian
P. Schwarz
dcterms:description: The Kaldi speech recognition toolkit is a software toolkit for speech recognition that provides a flexible and extensible framework for building speech recognition systems.
dcterms:title: Kaldi speech recognition toolkit
